sentences.sContent: Congratulations on the birth of your daughter!
He only weighed 2 kilos at birth .
sentences.sCn: 他出生时体重只有两公斤。

sentences.sContent: Henry has been blind from birth .

sentences.sCn: 你的出生日期是哪一天？

sentences.sContent: The exact place of birth is not recorded.
sentences.sCn: 确切的出生地没有记录。

sentences.sContent: They believe that the position of the planets at the time of birth determines the fate of the individual.
sentences.sCn: 他们相信，出生时的星象决定了一个人的命运。

sentences.sContent: More and more women are choosing to have home births .
sentences.sCn: 越来越多的女性选择在家分娩。

sentences.sContent: Smoking in pregnancy has been linked to premature birth .
sentences.sCn: 孕期吸烟已被认为与早产有关联。

sentences.sContent: the association between birth weight and blood pressure
sentences.sCn: 出生体重和血压的关系

sentences.sContent: The drug was found to cause serious birth defects .
sentences.sCn: 这种药被发现可造成严重的先天缺陷。

phrases.pCn: n. [宗]童贞女之子；[动]单性生殖

words.tran: 生育的；生育用的；分娩用的

trans.tranOther: the time when a baby comes out of its mother’s body
